page.title: 15FARM CHANGES NEAR YANWORTH
page.content: { Amalgamating 3 estate farms}allows both co-ordination of farming policy under one Estate Manager and Heads of Department and individual expertise. {Employment policy }encourages young farm workers-not always from a farming family background-with 1 or 2 years training at an agricultural college. The{sheep-cattle total}has changed little. The{barley-wheat acreage}has increased,thus changing the landscape. {Improved fertilisers}etc.has allowed a smaller area of improved grassland to be more intensively grazed, giving in- creased yields,mainly for cattle feed. A{work force reduction}from 55 to 17 has increased the need for men and machines to be used efficiently and effectively. A{radio}links the estate office with key personnel. {The large estate can enjoy the ad- {vantages of scale,a small farm cannot.
